Tests name() and path() methods of NetworkRequest.

Dumping request name and path for url: http://www.example.com/foo/bar/baz?key=value
    name = baz?key=value
    path = www.example.com/foo/bar
    targetUrl = http://127.0.0.1/aFolder/aTest.html
